name: No Escape (itch) (ItsFelipe23)
description:
This game was created in collaboration with @Dujafelsa. I post it here again for portfolio reasons.

In Korea there is a legend about a ghost, more exactly the Virgin Ghost where if there is a female that dies as a virgin she will be haunting the place she died until she will find her peace.

You will have to complete all the puzzles in order to escape the house, try not to get caught by the ghost.

Good luck :)
